item.title: Github Error
item.description: $ git commit -m “first commit"错误 丢失或跳过git add .或git commit可能导致此错误： $ git commit -m "first commit" On branch main Initial commit Untracked files: (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed) .gitignore README.md _config.butterfly.yml _config.yml gulpfile.js package.json repoPic/ scaffolds/ source/ themes/ nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track) $ git push -u origin main错误 error: src refspec main does not match any error: failed to push some refs to 'https://github.
